scripts.clean: rm -rf .enb/tmp && rm -rf bem/pages/_merged && rm -rf bem/examples && rm -rf bem/docs
scripts.make: YENV=development node_modules/enb/bin/enb make && node_modules/enb/bin/enb make docs && node_modules/enb/bin/enb make examples
scripts.prod: npm run clean && YENV=production node_modules/enb/bin/enb make
scripts.dist: npm run prod && gulp minify_images && gulp make_archive
scripts.cleanw: set YENV=production && node_modules\.bin\enb.cmd make clean && rmdir .enb\tmp /s /q && rmdir bem\pages\_merged /s /q && del index.html /f /q
scripts.serverw: del index.html /f /q && set YENV=development && node_modules\.bin\enb.cmd server
scripts.makew: set YENV=development && node_modules\.bin\enb.cmd make && gulp make_index
scripts.prodw: npm run cleanw && set YENV=production && node_modules\.bin\enb.cmd make && gulp make_index
scripts.distw: npm run prodw && gulp minify_images && gulp make_archive
